channel.description: Recent content in openssl on Hugo's IT journal

item.title: How to create ssl cert for tls auth
item.description: Procedures> Procedures # create private key create csr (distinguished_name) sign csr by CA (x509v3) Commands> Commands # Gen private key> Gen private key # openssl genrsa \ -out ca.key Self signed crt> Self signed crt # openssl req -x509 \ -config openssl.
